product_name: Timbuk2 Especial Vuelo Cycling Laptop Backpack
long_description: Designed to carry your essentials, the lightweight and weatherproof Timbuk2 Especial Vuelo Cycling Laptop Backpack boasts a compact profile, easy organization and capacity for a 15 in. computer.
short_description: Designed to carry your essentials, the lightweight and weatherproof Timbuk2 Especial Vuelo Cycling Laptop Backpack boasts a compact profile, easy organization and capacity for a 15 in. computer.
